name: don't be late (lilBernier)
description:
DON'T BE LATE 

 in this replayable time racing game you are a bomb defuser who suffers from short term memory loss, you use sticky notes to remind yourself of things including your defuse instructions.

Objective:
  • defuse bomb in under 20 seconds
Controls:
  • left click  to grab, cut, & press
  • mouse movement while grab to rotate
Two modes:
  • easy peasy - less steps and actions to defuse
  • hardy tardy - more steps and actions to defuse, if this is too easy let me know, i'll ramp it up
